creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund; purchase from the collection of Elizabeth and Willard Clark
inscription: {kokoro naki/ mi ni mo aware wa/ shirarekeri/ shigi tatsu sawa no/ aki no yugure} (Without my knowing it/ sadness has consumed/ my whole body/ as snipes rise from the strand/ in the autumn dusk)
medium: Hanging scroll, left of a triptych, ink and light color on silk
object_name: hanging scroll, one of a triptych
title: Landscape [left of a triptych of Three Scenes of Autumn Evening]
